workflowInfo.workflowDescription: Deprovision stand alone WAS app server.

variable.name: SERVER_ID_NUM
variable.label: Server ID Number
variable.abstract: Three digit number identifying server instance (including leading zeroes)
variable.description: Three digit number identifying the server instance to be deprovisioned. This number is embedded in the server job name. For example, to deprovision server ZZ001S, specify 001 for the Server ID Number.

variable.name: CONFIG_ROOT
variable.label: CONFIG_ROOT
variable.description: Each app server profile will be created in its own file system. This directory will contain mount points for each of those file systems.

variable.name: USER_HLQ
variable.label: USER_HLQ
variable.abstract: High level qualifier to be used for ZFS datasets
variable.description: A ZFS will be created to contain the profile for each provisioned app server. The ZFS dataset name will begin with this high level qualifier.

variable.name: SERVER_GROUP_PREFIX
variable.label: SERVER_GROUP_PREFIX
variable.abstract: Two character prefix for all servers in group
variable.description: Two character prefix for all servers in group. This is used to create user names, group names, proc names, and paths.

variable.name: CERT_AUTH_LABEL
variable.label: CERT_AUTH_LABEL
variable.description: Label of the Certificate authority to be created.

variable.name: CLOUD_NAME
variable.label: CLOUD_NAME
variable.description: The name of the cloud definition in the z/OS Communication Server

variable.name: DOMAIN_NAME
variable.label: DOMAIN_NAME
variable.abstract: Domain name to be used for provisioned app servers
variable.description: The zDaemonIPName parameter within zpmt.sh is set to a fully qualified host name formed by concatenating the SERVER_GROUP_PREFIX, the SERVER_ID_NUM, and this domain name.

variable.name: EXEC_DATASET
variable.label: EXEC_DATASET
variable.abstract: Dataset containing execs required for provisioning
variable.description: Dataset containing execs required for provisioning

variable.name: HOSTNAME
variable.label: HOSTNAME
variable.abstract: Host name of system where zosmf is running.
variable.description: Host name of system where zosmf is running.

variable.name: JOB_STATEMENT_1
variable.label: JOB_STATEMENT_1
variable.description: First job statement provided to zpmt.sh during profile creation. This is for future use.

variable.name: JOB_STATEMENT_2
variable.label: JOB_STATEMENT_2
variable.description: Second job statement provided to zpmt.sh during profile creation. This is for future use.

variable.name: JOB_STATEMENT_3
variable.label: JOB_STATEMENT_3
variable.description: Third job statement provided to zpmt.sh during profile creation. This is for future use.

variable.name: JOB_STATEMENT_4
variable.label: JOB_STATEMENT_4
variable.description: Fourth job statement provided to zpmt.sh during profile creation. This is for future use.

variable.name: PROCLIB
variable.label: PROCLIB
variable.description: Name of dataset within JES PROCLIB concatenation that will contain procs used by the app server.

variable.name: SYSPLEX_NAME
variable.label: SYSPLEX_NAME
variable.description: Name of the sysplex where zosmf is running

variable.name: SYSTEM_NAME
variable.label: SYSTEM_NAME
variable.description: Name of the system where zosmf is running

variable.name: WAS_PATH
variable.label: WAS_PATH
variable.description: Path to WebSphere Application Server product code

variable.name: WORK_PATH
variable.label: WORK_PATH
variable.description: Path to contain the files used by zpmt.sh.

variable.name: WORKLOAD_DEPLOYMENT_GROUP
variable.label: WORKLOAD_DEPLOYMENT_GROUP
variable.description: The name of the workload deployment group in the z/OS Communication Server

variable.name: Z_CONFIG_HFS_VOLUME
variable.label: Z_CONFIG_HFS_VOLUME
variable.description: DASD volume where the config zfs will be created

variable.name: Z_CONFIG_HFS_PRIMARY
variable.label: Z_CONFIG_HFS_PRIMARY
variable.description: Initial number of cylinders used for the creation of the app server config file system

variable.name: Z_CONFIG_HFS_SECONDARY
variable.label: Z_CONFIG_HFS_SECONDARY
variable.description: Secondary amount of cylinders to be specified for the app server config file system

variable.name: Z_CONFIG_SPECIFY_SMS
variable.label: Z_CONFIG_SPECIFY_SMS
variable.description: Flag indicating whether SMS parameters need to be specified for the app server config file system

variable.name: Z_CONFIG_DATACLAS
variable.label: Z_CONFIG_DATACLAS
variable.description: App server config file system DATACLAS

variable.name: Z_CONFIG_MGMTCLAS
variable.label: Z_CONFIG_MGMTCLAS
variable.description: App server config file system MGMTCLAS

variable.name: Z_CONFIG_STORCLAS
variable.label: Z_CONFIG_STORCLAS
variable.description: App server config file system STORCLAS

variable.name: ZPMT_DATASET_HLQ
variable.label: ZPMT_DATASET_HLQ
variable.description: High level qualifier of datasets that will contain jobs and execs used in setting up the app server.

variable.name: STARTING_GID
variable.label: STARTING_GID
variable.description: This is the first in a range of uids that will be referenced in the app server profile creation.

variable.name: STARTING_UID
variable.label: STARTING_UID
variable.description: This is the first in a range of uids that will be referenced in the app server profile creation.

variable.name: Z_CONFIG_AUTO_GID
variable.label: Z_CONFIG_AUTO_GID
variable.description: Flag indicating whether RACF should assign GIDs automatically.

variable.name: Z_CONFIG_AUTO_UID
variable.label: Z_CONFIG_AUTO_UID
variable.description: Flag indicating whether RACF should assign GIDs automatically.

variable.name: SOAP_CONNECTOR_ADDRESS_ID
variable.label: SOAP_CONNECTOR_ADDRESS_ID
variable.abstract: Soap port ID for the app server
variable.description: The ID of the allocated Soap port to use during deprovisioning

variable.name: UID0_USER
variable.label: UID0_USER
variable.description: UID0_USER - Specifies id to be associated with workflow steps that run zpmt.sh and the batch jobs it creates.

variable.name: CONSOLE_USER
variable.label: CONSOLE_USER
variable.description: CONSOLE_USER - Specifies user id to be associated with workflow steps that issue z/OS console commands.

variable.name: PWRESET_USER
variable.label: PWRESET_USER
variable.description: PWRESET_USER - Specifies user id to be associated with workflow step that resets the admin user id password.

variable.name: IP_USER
variable.label: IP_USER
variable.description: IP_USER - Specifies user id to be associated with workflow steps that request IP address and ports from z/OSMF Configuration Assistant.

variable.name: PROCLIB_USER
variable.label: PROCLIB_USER
variable.description: PROCLIB_USER - Specifies user id to be associated with workflow steps that update a dataset in the JES2 proclib concatenation.

variable.name: UID0_APPROVER
variable.label: UID0_APPROVER
variable.description: UID0_APPROVER - Specifies id to approve workflow steps that run zpmt.sh and the batch jobs it creates.

variable.name: CONSOLE_APPROVER
variable.label: CONSOLE_APPROVER
variable.description: CONSOLE_APPROVER - Specifies user id to approve workflow steps that issue z/OS console commands.

variable.name: PWRESET_APPROVER
variable.label: PWRESET_APPROVER
variable.description: PWRESET_APPROVER - Specifies user id to approve workflow step that resets the admin user id password.

variable.name: IP_APPROVER
variable.label: IP_APPROVER
variable.description: IP_APPROVER - Specifies user id to approve workflow steps that request IP address and ports from z/OSMF Configuration Assistant.

variable.name: PROCLIB_APPROVER
variable.label: PROCLIB_APPROVER
variable.description: PROCLIB_APPROVER - Specifies user id to approve workflow steps that update a dataset in the JES2 proclib concatenation.

variable.name: ADMIN_UID
variable.label: ADMIN_UID
variable.abstract: UID of the WAS admin user
variable.description: The value of this variable is calculated within the zpmt response file template based on the STARTING_UID and the SERVER_ID_NUM.

variable.name: CONFIG_GID
variable.label: CONFIG_GID
variable.description: The value of this variable is calculated within the zpmt response file template based on the STARTING_GID and the SERVER_ID_NUM.

variable.name: CONTROL_UID
variable.label: CONTROL_UID
variable.abstract: UID of the user id for the control region
variable.description: The value of this variable is calculated within the zpmt response file template based on the STARTING_UID and the SERVER_ID_NUM.

variable.name: LOCAL_USER_GID
variable.label: LOCAL_USER_GID
variable.abstract: GID of the local user group
variable.description: The value of this variable is calculated within the zpmt response file template based on the STARTING_GID and the SERVER_ID_NUM.

variable.name: SERVANT_GID
variable.label: SERVANT_GID
variable.abstract: GID of the servant user group
variable.description: The value of this variable is calculated within the zpmt response file template based on the STARTING_GID and the SERVER_ID_NUM.

variable.name: SERVANT_UID
variable.label: SERVANT_UID
variable.abstract: UID of the user id for the servant region
variable.description: The value of this variable is calculated within the zpmt response file template based on the STARTING_UID and the SERVER_ID_NUM.

variable.name: UNAUTH_UID
variable.label: UNAUTH_UID
variable.abstract: UID of the WAS unauthenticated user
variable.description: The value of this variable is calculated within the zpmt response file template based on the STARTING_UID and the SERVER_ID_NUM.

variable.name: IP_ADDRESS
variable.label: IP_ADDRESS
variable.abstract: IP Address for the app server
variable.description: IP Address for the app server

variable.name: IP_ADDRESS_ID
variable.label: IP_ADDRESS_ID
variable.abstract: IP Address ID for the app server
variable.description: The ID of the allocated IP address to use during deprovisioning

step.name: promptForID
step.title: Provide Server ID Number
step.description: Provide Server ID Number
step.instructions: Click FINISH to perform this step and deprovision the specified application server.

step.name: resetAdminPW
step.title: resetAdminPW
step.description: resetAdminPW
step.instructions: This step runs automatically to reset the password of the WAS admin user id.

template.inlineTemplate: /* Rexx */ trace commands address tso "alu ${instance-SERVER_GROUP_PREFIX}AD${instance-SERVER_ID_NUM} password(${instance-DEFAULT_ADMIN_PW})" exit

step.name: stopAppServer
step.title: stopAppServer
step.description: stopAppServer
step.instructions: stopAppServer

step.name: getDeprovisionProperties
step.title: Get properties for deprovisioning
step.description: Get properties set during provisioning
step.instructions: Read properties from file

step.name: returnIPAddress
step.title: Return IP Address
step.description: Invoke RESTful API to return IP address back to pool.
step.instructions: Execute step to return the IP address back to z/OS Communications Server.

step.instructions: Execute step to return the Soap port back to z/OS Communications Server.

step.name: clearClassCache
step.title: Run clearClassCache to delete java shared class cache
step.description: Run clearClassCache to delete java shared class cache
step.instructions: This step runs automatically to clear the shared class cache
